item.title: Build a Portfolio using Hugo and github
item.description: This is not my first time try to build my own website, but finally make it on-line again. In the end of last semester (Dec 2021), I actually finished my own ePortfolio through WordPress. It was on-line through school’s WordPress account. I was also quite satisfied of my hard work. However, everything got deleted accidentally by a school technician ðŸ˜± ðŸ˜± ðŸ˜± Eventhough I felt upset ðŸ˜­ and kind of mad ðŸ’¢.
